strapiPost.title: Explore NWA's Fantastic Mexican Eateries This Cinco De Mayo
strapiPost.content:
Northwest Arkansas isn't lacking when it comes to delicious Mexican cuisine. We've compiled a list of our favorite spots for local, authentic Mexican restaurants to help you nail down some plans to celebrate Cinco de Mayo!

  • Plenty to try: Award-winning Yeyo's El Alma De Mexico has three locations across Bentonville and Rogers, and if you're in Downtown Springdale, try our old favorite, Taqueria Don Guero, or a new favorite, Casa Alejo.
  • Off-menu items: Not on the list (yet) but worth a mention, Carmelitas Modern Mexican Cuisine is hosting its Grand Opening today in Springdale. And an off-the-beaten-path lunch spot that won't disappoint, El Campesino Market & Restaurant in Rogers whips up a mean Torta.

Find our complete guide HERE.
